scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run watch:feflow" "npm run dev -w docs"
scripts.release:feflow: npm run build:feflow && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:cli: npm run build:cli && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:cli:patch: npm version patch -w @dxdns/feflow-cli --no-git-tag-version && git add packages/cli/package.json && git commit -m "chore(release): bump version CLI" && git tag cli-v$(node -p "require('./packages/cli/package.json').version") && npm run release:cli
scripts.release:feflow:patch: npm version patch -w @dxdns/feflow --no-git-tag-version && git add packages/feflow/package.json && git commit -m "chore(release): bump version Feflow" && git tag feflow-v$(node -p "require('./packages/feflow/package.json').version") && npm run release:feflow
